name: The Sims Medieval

task.description: Setting version to xp for SimsMedievalLauncher...
task.name: set_regedit

content:
game:
  appid: 102820
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating prefix
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- execute:
    command: ln -s "$GAMEDIR/prefix" "$CACHE/prefix"
- execute:
    command: ln -s "$HOME/.local/share/lutris" "$GAMEDIR/prefix/dosdevices/g:"
- task:
    app: dotnet20
    arch: win32
    description: Installing .Net 2.0
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $CACHE/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Setting version to xp for SimsMedievalLauncher...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\AppDefaults\SimsMedievalLauncher.exe
    prefix: $CACHE/prefix
    value: winxp
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Setting version to 7 for default...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $CACHE/prefix
    value: win7
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  restore_gamma: true
winesteam:
  UseXVidMode: true
  overrides:
    steamwebhelper.exe: disabled
